sense.gloss: to shut oneself in (e.g. one's room), to be confined in, to seclude oneself, to hide away, to stay inside (one's shell)
to be filled with (emotion, enthusiasm, etc.)
to fill the room (of a gas, smell, etc.), to be heavy with (e.g. smoke), to be stuffy, to be dense
to confine oneself in a temple to pray

sdata.j: ↑一日中↑↓いちにちじゅう↓↑家↑↓か↓に↑閉↑↓と↓じ|こもる|のは↑健康↑↓けんこう↓に↑良↑↓よ↓くない。
sdata.e: It is not good for your health to shut yourself in all day.

sdata.j: ↑不↑↓ふ↓↑活発↑↓かっぱつ↓な↑子供↑↓こども↓は↑空想↑↓くうそう↓の↑世界↑↓せかい↓に↑閉↑↓と↓じ|こもる|↑傾向↑↓けいこう↓がずっと↑高↑↓たか↓い。
sdata.e: The inactive child is far more inclined to live in a world of fantasy.

sdata.j: ↑車椅子↑↓くるまいす↓の↑女性↑↓じょせい↓、スーパーに↑立↑↓た↓て|こもる|。
sdata.e: Woman in a wheelchair holes up in supermarket.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓を↑忌避↑↓きひ↓して↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑閉↑↓と↓じ|こもる|というよりは、↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓に↑対↑↓たい↓して↑常↑↓つね↓に↑攻撃↑↓こうげき↓↑的↑↓てき↓な↑態度↑↓たいど↓をとり↑続↑↓つづ↓けた。
sdata.e: He continues always being aggressive towards society, rather than repelling society and confining himself.
